edge: Jackson 'Jack' Maine, an established singer-songwriter and alcoholic, is Ally's mentor.
Lady Gaga plays the character of Ally Campana, a singer-songwriter who is discovered by Jack.
Ally's father Lorenzo Campana is played by Andrew Dice Clay.
George 'Noodles' Stone, a retired musician and Jack's best friend, is played by Dave Chappelle.
Sam Elliott portrays Bobby Maine, Jackson's older half-brother and manager.
Rafi Gavron plays the character of Rafi Gavron, a music producer and Ally's manager.
Anthony Ramos portrays Anthony Ramos, Ally's friend.
Drena De Niro plays Paulette Stone, Noodles' wife.
Jack's driver Phil is played by Greg Grunberg.
Shangela appears as the drag bar MC.
Willam Belli portrays Emerald, a drag queen.
Jackson's rehab therapist Carl is played by Ron Rifkin.
Little Feet, a veteran session musician, is portrayed by Barry Shabaka Henley.
Gail is played by Rebecca Field.
Wolfie, a friend of Lorenzo, is portrayed by Michael Harney.
